data.prayer: Lord, make the 20,400 believers in Chagang-do to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,279,401 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chagang-do, North Korea
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Chagang-do that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Chagang-do, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Chagang-do, North Korea.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Mongol, Khalka people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Mongol, Khalka people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Mongol, Khalka people is yours.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Chagang-do, North Korea.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 20,400 believers in Chagang-do to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chagang-do, North Korea has a population of 1,299,800.

We estimate Chagang-do has 20,400 people who might know Jesus, 1,142 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,278,259 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 63 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Chagang-do a passion to plant another simple church.
